title: 1,001 noughts
creator_credit: Lauren Woodby, Davidson Films and General Learning Corporation
brief_description: An ancient Arabian story poses a problem. Magic carpets are used as weapons of war and, in order to determine how many each enemy has, the king has to solve the multiplication problem that gives this information. Previewing recommended for follow-up work for teachers. Suitable for middle and upper primary levels.
